backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister defining an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features to the files they modify and their associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style layers defining a pastel light/dark theme using OKLCH color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling screen navigation and rendering feature screens with global music and theme controls.
frontend/src/components/MusicControl.tsx: UI control for playing, pausing, and muting ambient music using the useAmbientMusic hook.
frontend/src/components/sections/BubbleG: Relax-mode mini‑game that spawns tappable bubbles and plays a pop sound on click.
frontend/src/components/sections/DailyQu: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/sections/DarkMod: Button that switches light/dark themes with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/sections/NotesCa: Notes editor with textarea input and save-to-localStorage functionality.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reminde: Self-care reminder buttons triggering notifications or alerts depending on browser permissions.
frontend/src/components/sections/TodoCar: To‑do list card allowing task creation, completion toggling, and inline input handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAmbientMusic.ts: Manages ambient background music playback, mute state, and persistence via localStorage using a ref-based audio element.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles AuthClient setup, login, logout, and restoring saved identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, plus custom utility classes for themed backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/FeatureScreenShell.ts: Shared layout wrapper that provides a title, back button, and styled container for feature pages.
frontend/src/pages/MenuScreen.tsx: Renders a central menu card with navigation buttons for the app's main features.
frontend/src/pages/OpeningScreen.tsx: Displays the introductory screen with a greeting and a button to proceed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors from CSS variables and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s goals, implemented features, architecture notes, and known issues.
